Nightlight::

"I think that It sin't good idea"replied Nightlight"We're only two 
and they are more and regarding that they aren't happy after our last 
battle... if they discover us we would be in jaws."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Blackfang then switched to his magnetic resonance vision. If metal 
had 
> been light, he would have been blinded. The predacons base was 
there, 
> about 3 km deeper in the marshy forest. They had found them.
> 
> Blackfang: You think it's worth to go nearer? They may have working 
> defenses...
> 
> -----------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> On the other side of the base, group Trian was getting close. 
Tyrael 
> knew what that meant. He prepared some shards, ready to throw them.
> 
> Tyrael: Talon, get ready. We attack on my mark... NOW!
> 
> He sent two light shards flying at the base. He wanted to test the 
> shields, so no need to use the big thing right away.
